mapper.select: SELECT GroupBy1.A1 C1 , GroupBy1.A2 C2 FROM ( SELECT MIN(Extent2.SALES_ORD_NO) A1 , MAX(Extent2.SALES_ORD_NO) A2 FROM SVC0001D Extent1 JOIN SAL0001D Extent2 ON Extent2.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent1.AS_SO_ID ) GroupBy1

SELECT Project1.AS_LG_DOC_TYPE_ID AS_LG_DOC_TYPE_ID , Project1.AS_DOC_NO AS_DOC_NO , Project1.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , Project1.C1 C1 , Project1.C2 C2 , Project1.C3 C3 , Project1.C4 C4 FROM ( SELECT Extent1.AS_DOC_NO AS_DOC_NO , Extent1.AS_LG_DOC_TYPE_ID AS_LG_DOC_TYPE_ID , Extent2.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.AS_LG_DT IS NOT NULL ) THEN TO_CHAR(Extent1.AS_LG_DT,'DD-MM-YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR('1900-01-01','yyyy-mm-dd') END C1 , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.AS_LG_AMT >0 ) THEN Extent1.AS_LG_AMT ELSE 0 END C2 , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.AS_LG_AMT <= 0 ) THEN Extent1.AS_LG_AMT ELSE 0 END C3 , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.AS_ADV_PAY IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.AS_ADV_PAY ELSE 0 END C4 FROM PAY0006D Extent1 JOIN SYS0013M Extent2 ON Extent1.AS_LG_DOC_TYPE_ID = Extent2.CODE_ID WHERE Extent1.AS_RESULT_NO = #{ASRNO} ) Project1 ORDER BY Project1.C1 ASC

SELECT Project1.MEM_CODE CODE_ID , Project1.MEM_CODE|| '-' ||Project1.NAME CODE_NAME , Project1.NAME NAME , Project1.NRIC NRIC , Project1.MEM_TYPE MEM_TYPE FROM ( SELECT Extent1.MEM_ID MEM_ID , Extent1.MEM_CODE MEM_CODE , Extent1.MEM_TYPE MEM_TYPE , Extent1.NAME NAME , Extent1.NRIC NRIC FROM ORG0001D Extent1 WHERE ( 1 = Extent1.STUS ) AND ( Extent1.MEM_TYPE = 3 ) ) Project1 ORDER BY Project1.MEM_CODE ASC
